def_cn: （一个演员所能表演的）全部节目，曲目
def_en: A per-former's repertoire is all the plays or pieces of music that he or she has learned and can perform.
The repertoire of a person or thing is all the things of a particular kind that the person or thing is capable of doing.

def_cn: （某个种类的）全部剧目(或曲目)
def_en: You can refer to all the plays or music of a particular kind as, for example, the classical repertoire or the jazz repertoire .
